  2. Apple is finally going to open up iPhone tap-to-pay  The Verge
  3. Apple (AAPL) to Open Payment Chip to Third Parties and Charge Fees  Bloomberg
  4. USDC to embrace tap-and-go payments after Apple opens up NFC  Cointelegraph
  5. Apple Opens Up NFC Interface And Secure Element. This Is Huge.  Forbes

item.title: Molson Coors stages exit from the craft beer industry - Axios
item.description:
1. Molson Coors stages exit from the craft beer industry  Axios
  2. Tilray to buy four craft breweries from Molson Coors  Reuters
  3. Tilray buys four Molson Coors brewers in hope of being ‘beacon for craft brands’  MarketWatch
  4. Atwater Brewery acquired by New York beverage & lifestyle company in deal with Molson Coors  WXYZ 7 Action News Detroit
  5. Tilray to Acquire Craft Beer Brands from Molson Coors  The Wall Street Journal
